stepItems.title: What do you want your homepage META description to be?
stepItems.help:
• This is usually shown in Google results, so make it compelling
  • Include why the searcher should clickthrough to your shop
  • Good example: \"Quality, handcrafted wooden propeller blades, props and chucks made using traditional processes. In sustainable Cherry, Maple and other woods.\"
  • Limit it to two or three sentences
  • Don't worry, this isn't permanent as we'll make it easy for you to change later

stepItems.title: What do you want your homepage page title to be?
stepItems.help:
• Select something that's unique about your shop
  • Avoid including 'Welcome to' and your shop name
  • Good example: \"Buy handcrafted wooden propeller blades from sustainable Cherry wood\"
  • Don't worry, this isn't permanent as we'll make it easy for you to change later

stepItems.title: What do you want to include at the end of all page titles?
stepItems.help:
• Include your shop name
  • Keep it concise, including your most popular categories
  • Good example: \"Ohio Propellers Inc. for propeller blades, props and chucks\"
  • Don't worry, this isn't permanent as we'll make it easy for you to change later

description:
Structure your HTML (website code) properly and ensuring the right keywords are used in the right places is essential to ensure you have the best chance to rank well in Google, Bing and other search engines.

Page titles, meta descriptions, headings, ALT tags all have a part to play in this. With many e-commerce and website platforms like Shopify, Bigcommerce and Wordpress lots of this can be automatically generated with the right code in place. 

Your site template code will be fixed to take full advantage of this and correct HTML errors (things like duplicate title tags). You don't need any programming experience. You simply answer a few questions about the keywords you'd like to target. 

If your site isn't in English that's okay too. As long as you can provide keywords in your language and message your fixer in English we can handle all of the coding. Spanish, French, Danish, Thai and other customers have successfully completed this job.
